meanings.definition: Harshness or severity of weather conditions
meanings.sent1: The inclemency of the storm made it dangerous to go outside.
meanings.sent2: We were unprepared for the sudden inclemency of the blizzard.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined by the unexpected inclemency of the rain.
meanings.sent4: The inclemency of winter froze the lake solid.
meanings.sent5: The inclemency of the heatwave was unbearable for the hikers.
